title: Men: The Handbook
description: Compiled from the results of several research studies conducted over the last 10 to 15 years. The information is presented in a straightforward manner that is easy to understand. This book sheds some light on the inner workings of the male brain and why male to male interactions are different from male to female interactions.Have you ever wondered what makes men think and act a certain way? This book will give you insight into the deeper layers of why men do what they do.Learn about the different types of men and what drives them to do the things they do. Learn how men really feel and think about relationships. Find out why men are more complex than just Drinking, Sports, and Sex.
author: Stephen B. Fraser
